info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 12 at 5:46PM CDT until July 12 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CLAIBORNE...NORTHERN CAMPBELL AND NORTHEASTERN SCOTT COUNTIES... At 645 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near La Follette, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... La Follette, Jellico, Elk Valley, Ketchen, Indian Mountain State Park, Clairfield, Fincastle and White Oak. This includes Interstate 75 in Tennessee between mile markers 143 and 161. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
